content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good and fun contribution!

I like it and gave you an up vote, but I think you need to change this phrasing because a line doesn’t have a column:
“All lines contain the same number of columns”

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Great idea, like it
Hello, great idea, but for my opinion you should add also Test2 to examples, it'll help people faster understand idea for the task

Goal
* Please mention that every item in a column is left-aligned and filled with the minimum number of space characters necessary.

Input
* Please change "Lines" to "[[lines]]".

Stub generator
* Please change "ROW" to "lines" for consistency.

Thanks.
Thanks! I've added your suggestions. For the stub generator, I've changed it to "line" for a better understanding.
Thank you for your comment! Idk how to add several test cases to examples, so I reversed the first two test cases.
I've replaced "columns" by "items" for a better understanding. Thanks for your comment!

The only way to show more examples is to copy and paste them to Goal section (there's no way to show more examples in Example section). But that should only be done when accompanying explanation is added at the same time. Otherwise, a player should just check out the individual cases by themselves.
